org.apache.flink.runtime.blob

类 BlobServerConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.blob.BlobServerConnection
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable

    class BlobServerConnection
extends java.lang.Thread
    A BLOB connection handles a series of requests from a particular BLOB client.

    • 嵌套类概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BlobServerConnection

        BlobServerConnection(java.net.Socket clientSocket,
                     BlobServer blobServer)
        Creates a new BLOB connection for a client request.
        参数:
        clientSocket - The socket to read/write data.
        blobServer - The BLOB server.

    • 方法详细资料

      • run

        public void run()
        Main connection work method. Accepts requests until the other side closes the connection.
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable
        覆盖:
        run 在类中 java.lang.Thread

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the connection socket and lets the thread exit.

      • get

        private void get(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                 java.io.OutputStream outputStream,
                 byte[] buf)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Handles an incoming GET request from a BLOB client.

        Transient BLOB files are deleted after a successful read operation by the client. Note that we do not enforce atomicity here, i.e. multiple clients reading from the same BLOB may still succeed.

        参数:
        inputStream - the input stream to read incoming data from
        outputStream - the output stream to send data back to the client
        buf - an auxiliary buffer for data serialization/deserialization
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs while reading/writing data from/to the respective streams

      • put

        private void put(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                 java.io.OutputStream outputStream,
                 byte[] buf)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Handles an incoming PUT request from a BLOB client.
        参数:
        inputStream - The input stream to read incoming data from
        outputStream - The output stream to send data back to the client
        buf - An auxiliary buffer for data serialization/deserialization
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs while reading/writing data from/to the respective streams

      • readFileFully

        private static byte[] readFileFully(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                                    java.io.File incomingFile,
                                    byte[] buf)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a full file from inputStream into incomingFile returning its checksum.
        参数:
        inputStream - stream to read from
        incomingFile - file to write to
        buf - An auxiliary buffer for data serialization/deserialization
        返回:
        the received file's content hash
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs while reading/writing data from/to the respective streams

      • writeErrorToStream

        private static void writeErrorToStream(java.io.OutputStream out,
                                       java.lang.Throwable t)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Writes to the output stream the error return code, and the given exception in serialized form.
        参数:
        out - Thr output stream to write to.
        t - The exception to send.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the output stream could not be written to.
